directions: Stir Worcestershire sauce, ketchup, mayonnaise, horseradish, lemon juice, garlic powder, and black pepper together in a bowl. Cover bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate until chilled, 30 minutes to a full day.
ingredients: 1 1/2 teaspoons prepared horseradish, or to taste
1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper, or to taste
title: Poor Boy Spread
